subject_name_vi: Nhập môn khoa học máy tính

description.overview: This course provides an overview of computer fundamentals. Topics cover all areas of computer science in breadth such as computer organization, network, operating system, data structure, file structure, social and ethical issues.
major_instructional_areas: Introduction to Von Neumann Model and computer components
Different data types and operations on data
The concepts of computer networking and internet
Introduction to basic algorithms and algorithms representation
Introduction to Data structure and File structure

additional_learning.title: AI For Everyone
additional_learning.note: Students must complete the course and achieve certificate

student_tasks.task: Attend at least 80% of contact sessions to be eligible for final examination
Complete and submit all exercises, assignments and labs on time
Use laptop in class only for learning purpose
Complete Additional Learning (AI For Everyone) and achieve certificate
Regularly check FLM system for up-to-date course information

clos.description: Understand the subsystems of a computer and describe the role of these components
Know how to convert a number from one base to other base (decimal, binary, octal and hexadecimal)
Describe how different data type is stored inside a computer as bit patterns and operations on data
Describe the layers in networking and their relationship
Understand the role of OS in a computer system
Define an algorithm and describe tools used to develop algorithms
Explain how a program in a high-level language is translated into machine language
Discuss some data structures: Array, Records, Linked list
Distinguish between text file and binary file and access methods
Describe and explain operations within a relational database
Describe security goals and discuss ethical issues
Describe artificial intelligence and its basic concepts
